sentences: Leon Spencer (November 1, 1945 â€“ March 11, 2012) was an American jazz organist from Houston, Texas.
He played piano with David Newman and organ with Melvin Sparks.
Spencer recorded for Prestige in the early 1970s with Buddy Caldwell, Idris Muhammad, Melvin Sparks, and Grover Washington Jr.
